entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
